titleStmt.title: An act for repeal of two acts for sequestrations. Fryday March 2. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas, clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Streater, and John Macock, printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Title ornaments; some text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
